item.title: Else statement wont work
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

hello, I am making construction and my else statement while making a chair doesnt work. You see you need a plank to make the object, and my else statement says that if they dont have a plant, dont make the object. But it avoids this and makes the object anyways. Here is my else statement:

} else if(!playerHasItem(960, 1) && (q1 == 15)) { sM("you do not have a plank to make a chair"); return; }

i get no errors while compiling, but in-game it doesnt work
all help is appreciated rep + if you do help

Read full topic
